name: Artillery Globe
description: Command missile strikes, strategically capture resources, conquer the globe. Outwit your opponent in one-on-one battles and lay claim to victory. Shoot cannons and missiles across the globe to hit enemy units on the opposite side the planet.
minimum_requirements: OS: OS: Windows 7 64-bit Processor: Intel Core i3-4160 @ 3.60GHz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 670, or better DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible soundcard or onboard chipset
